label: Text
name: text
description: Text that will be converted to audio

label: Volume
name: volume
description: Voice volume value, in range between 0 (lowest) and 1 (highest)

label: Pitch
name: pitch
description: Voice pitch value, in range between 0 (lowest) and 2 (highest)

label: Rate
name: rate
description: Voice rate value, in range between 0.1 (lowest) and 10 (highest)
